title.text: 2021-01 Cumulative Update for Azure Stack HCI, version 20H2 for x64-based Systems (KB4598232)

description.text: Install this update to resolve issues in Azure Stack HCI, version 20H2. For a complete listing of the issues that are included in this update, see the associated Microsoft Knowledge Base article for more information. After you install this item, you may have to restart your computer.
